title: Ye Olde Falcon Pub
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family-run Irish pub/restaurant offers vegan and gluten free menu choices and more upon request. Has garden pasta with marinara, marsala, or alfredo sauce made with soy cheese, veggie balls, boca burger, and fried pickles and mushrooms. Has indoor seating, as well as pet-friendly outdoor seating where your dog will be provided with water and complimentary dog biscuits.
